explain.paragraph1: This application allows you to set the location of grid items within a grid container. You can choose how many columns and rows each item will occupy.
explain.paragraph2: To set up, simply click on the desired cell with which you want to start and then, without releasing the mouse button, move it to the cell where you want to end.
explain.paragraph3: After you have everything set up, click the Generate code button, copy the generated code and paste it wherever you need.
explain.paragraph4: Adjustment can be made for three screen sizes separately (small, medium, large).
explain.paragraph5: The number of columns in grid-container is fixed (4 columns for small screen, and 12 columns for medium and large). You can change the number ofrows.
